name: Santa Clara County Self-Help Center
description: Free help with court forms, workshops, and self-representation in Santa Clara County
fullDescription: The Santa Clara County Self-Help Center provides free assistance to people representing themselves in court matters.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free help with court forms and procedures
- Family law workshops (divorce, custody, support)
- Restraining order assistance
- Small claims court help
- Eviction defense resources
- Debt collection guidance
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Self-Help Center at the downtown San Jose courthouse
2. Or access online resources and virtual workshops
3. Check website for workshop schedules
4. Bring your court papers and case information
address: 191 N. First Street, San Jose, CA 95113
keywords: self-help, court, Santa Clara, San Jose, forms, family law, divorce, custody, restraining order, small claims, eviction, free legal help
